Description: 2000 PRS McCarty Rosewood Neck Electric Guitar in excellent condition with little to no playwear. zero fret wear !! low action !! no issues!! Amber finish on the beautiful carved flame maple 10 top with gold hardware. The action is great and the pattern regular Indian Rosewood neck with a rosewood fret board and abalone bird inlays has a very comfortable feel.super shiny frets are in excellent condition. This is a very resonant solid-body electric. Stock McCarty pickup switching and Push/Pull coil tap.The guitar is perfect christmas gift to yourself !! includes prs stock case.note please ignore rookie pics..any reflection are from lighting..plus lemon oil was still drying.. plus solid rosewood pickup rings + rosewood back plate !
